title: Shutdown Fullcast 3.10
description:
It's our 200th episode recording with host Rodger Sherman, and we celebrate by discussing:
- possible non-conference upsets
- how you can bet actual money on teams like Rutgers and UNC to win the national championship, somehow
- Tampa/St. Petersburg and its burgeoning culinary scene
- other household items you could attack a quarterback with and call it training
- the 2001 film Driven starring Sylvester Stallone
- how there's nothing controversial happening in the CFB universe right now, nope, no sirree
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
It's our 200th episode recording with host Rodger Sherman, and we celebrate by discussing: - possible non-conference upsets - how you can bet actual money on teams like Rutgers and UNC to win the national championship, somehow - Tampa/St. Petersburg and its burgeoning culinary scene - other household items you could attack a quarterback with and call it training - the 2001 film Driven starring Sylvester Stallone - how there's nothing controversial happening in the CFB universe right now, nope, no sirree Learn more about your ad choices.
